author: forthommel
body:
This PR modifies the run ranges parser to account for scenarios where the first event number in a run is `0` instead of `1`, thus preventing any channels mapping to be defined for this event.
It hence allows runs at the edge of these ranges to properly retrieve a channels mapping for both the strips and diamond detectors.
It also backports a bug fix raised in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18283#issuecomment-296129695 by @perrotta preventing the CRC check to be performed on the VFAT frame is the unpacker verbosity is set to `0`.

`runTheMatrix -l limited` on bbc0068152f5d589f0610fe78c07ea5983a0b742 yielded `9 9 8 6 4 1 1 1 tests passed, 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed` (again, `DAS_ERROR` on `4.22`)
title: CTPPS: bug fix in run ranges for FEDs channels mapping
